GK16msabdvvu:7: kārakatvāt kalpyamāno vyāparo 'bhidhādiśabdapratipādyo nānāprakāra iti tatparīkṣārthaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:11: jātiḥ kriyā guṇaḥ saṃjñā vācyo 'rthaḥ samitadhvaniḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:12: agṛhītasaṅketasya śabdasyārthapratipatter abhāvāt saṅketasahāya eva śabdo 'rthaṃ pratipādayati
GK16msabdvvu:13: / tena samitaḥ saṅketito dhvaniḥ śabdo yatra yo 'rthaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:17: ityādi / iha yadyapi pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayo vyaktir eva,
GK16msabdvvu:19: ca tatra saṅketaḥ kartum na pāryata iti gauḥ śuklaś calo ḍittha ityādīnām ekārthatvaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:20: mā prasāṅkṣīd iti ca śabdānām upādhāv eva saṅketaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:25: uktaṃ hi vākyapadīye -- “gaur hi svarūpeṇa na gauḥ, nāpy agauḥ,
GK16msabdvvu:31: saṃhṛtakramaṃ svarūpaṃ vaktrā yadṛcchayā ḍitthādiṣv artheṣūpādhitayā saṃniveśyate
GK16msabdvvu:33: gauḥ śuklaś calo ḍittha ityādau catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ
GK16msabdvvu:36: / nanu payaḥśaṅkhādyāśrayībhūteṣu śuklādiguṇeṣu yadvaśena śuklaḥ śukla ity abhinnāv
GK16msabdvvu:39: / śukasārikādyudīriteṣu ḍitthādiśabdeṣu ca ḍitthādiśabdatvaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhidyamāne
GK16msabdvvu:40: vā ḍitthādyarthe ḍitthāditvam astīti katham catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttiḥ / ucyate
GK16msabdvvu:41: / saṃsthānāvasthānapramāṇavarṇair bhede 'pi vyaktīnāṃ śābaleyo gauḥ dhāvaleyo gaur
GK16msabdvvu:50: ekarūpatvam eva guṇakriyāyadṛcchānām iti naitāsāṃ bhinneṣv abhinnābhidhānapratyayahetur
GK16msabdvvu:51: jātir ghaṭata iti catvāry eva śabdapravṛttinimittāni //
GK16msabdvvu:54: śabde kuśala ityādau darbhagrahaṇādyayogāt gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ca gaṅgādīnāṃ ca
GK16msabdvvu:57: ityāder yeṣāṃ na tathā pratipattis teṣāṃ pāvanatvādīnāṃ tathāpratipādanātmanā prayojanena
GK16msabdvvu:63: upādānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cety uktā śuddhaiva sā dvividhā // 2 //
GK16msabdvvu:64: kuntān praveśaya yaṣṭī praveśayetyādau kuntādibhir ātmanaḥ praveśasiddhaye svasaṃyoginaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:68: anubandhanaṃ kathaṃ me syād iti jātyā vyaktir ākṣipyate na tu śabdenocyate / “viśeṣyaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:69: nābhidhā gacchet kṣiṇaśaktir viśeṣaṇe” iti nyāyād upādānalakṣaṇā nodāhartavyā / na
GK16msabdvvu:70: hy atra prayojanam asti na vā rūḍhiḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:75: ca / pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte ity atra ca rātribhojanaṃ na lakṣyate /
GK16msabdvvu:78: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ity atra taṭasya ghoṣādhikaraṇatāyāḥ
GK16msabdvvu:79: siddhaye gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārtham arpayatīty evamādau lakṣaṇenaiṣā lakṣaṇā /
GK16msabdvvu:82: anayor bhedayor lakṣyasya lakṣakasya ca na bhedarūpaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:84: taṭādīnāṃ gaṅgādiśabdaiḥ pratipādane tattvapratipattau hi pratipipādayiṣitaprayojanasampratyayaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:85: / gaṅgāsambandhamātrapratītau tu gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣa iti mukhyaśabdābhidhānāl lakṣaṇāyāḥ
GK16msabdvvu:87: sāropānyā tu yatroktau viṣayī viṣayas tathā /
GK16msabdvvu:88: āropyamāṇa āropaviśayaś ca yatrānupahnutabhedau sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiśyete sā lakṣaṇā
GK16msabdvvu:92: bhedāv imau ca sādṛśyāt saṃbandhāntaratas tathā /
GK16msabdvvu:94: imāv āropādhyavasānarūpau sādṛśyahetū gaur vāhīka ity atra gaur ayam ity atra ca /
GK16msabdvvu:95: atra svārthasahacāriṇo guṇā jāḍyamāndyādayo lakṣyamāṇā api gośabdasya parārthābhidhānaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:98: eva lakṣyante na tu parārtho 'bhidhīyata ity apare /
GK16msabdvvu:103: lakṣyamāṇaguṇair yogād vṛtter iṣṭā tu gauṇatā
GK16msabdvvu:104: iti / avinābhāvo 'tra sambandhamātraṃ na tu nāntarīyakatvam /
GK16msabdvvu:107: avinābhāve cākṣepeṇaiva siddher lakṣaṇāyā nopayoga ity uktam / yena
GK16msabdvvu:111: āyur evedam ityādau sādṛśyād anyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvādiḥ paraḥ sambandhaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:127: sā ca “vaktur vākyasya vācyasya rūpabhedād vibhidyate” /
GK16msabdvvu:130: upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kim ucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param /
GK16msabdvvu:131: vidadhad īdṛśam eva sadā sakhe sukhitam āssva tataḥ śaradām śatam //
GK16msabdvvu:132: bahubhir upakārais tāpyamānasya kasyacid uktir iyam /
GK16msabdvvu:138: nīvīṃ prati praṇihite ca kare priyeṇa
GK16msabdvvu:139: sakhyaḥ śapāmi yadi kiṃcid api smarāmi //
GK16msabdvvu:147: atra prāṇasamasya vyasane 'pi taṭasthas tṛṇamātram api dātum asamarthaś ca vācyaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:148: / evaṃ dvikabhedās trayaḥ trikabhedaś caika udāhāryaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:149: dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini kṣaṇam ihāpy asmadgṛhe dāsyasi
GK16msabdvvu:150: prāyo naiva śiśoḥ pitāsya virasāḥ kaupīr apaḥ pāsyasi /
GK16msabdvvu:151: ekākiny api yāmi tad drutam itaḥ srotas tamālākulaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:154: prāptaśrīr eṣa kasmāt punar api mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyān
GK16msabdvvu:155: nidrām apy asya pūrvām analasamanaso naiva sambhāvayāmi /
GK16msabdvvu:156: setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kim iti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyāte
GK16msabdvvu:157: tvayy āyāte vitarkān iti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ //
GK16msabdvvu:159: durvārā madaneṣavo diśi diśi vyājṛmbhate mādhavo
GK16msabdvvu:162: soḍhavyāḥ sakhi sāmprataṃ katham amī pañcāgnayo duḥsahā //
GK16msabdvvu:163: ity atra ca nādeyapānīyānayanena parapuruṣasambhogasya naḍagranthalekhanena sambhāvyamānanakhadaśanakṣatānāṃ
GK16msabdvvu:170: sambhavāt / ākṣiptasyālaṅkārasya lakṣyatve ca vahnyānayane pātrānayanasya lakṣyatvaprasaṅgāt
GK16msabdvvu:183: satyām api vā tasyāṃ niyatasmaraṇaṃ na syāt / tasmāc
GK16msabdvvu:188: na lakṣaṇā tasmin sati hi sā na tu tadviṣayā /
GK16msabdvvu:190: bādho 'sti / lakṣyaprayojanayoś ca sambandhasya prayojanasya cābhāvāt /
GK16msabdvvu:197: nanu gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣa ityādisvaśabdād yādṛgarthapratītir na bhavati tādṛśī gaṅgāyāṃ
GK16msabdvvu:198: ghoṣa ityādes tad eva prayojanaṃ pāvanatvādidharmākrāntaṃ ca taṭādi lakṣyate iti viśiśṭe
GK16msabdvvu:200: evaṃ hi taṭādeḥ pāvanatvādīnāṃ ca dharmadharmibhāvaś
GK16msabdvvu:213: iti tritayātmanā saṅketabhedena lakṣaṇā sā kathaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ gocarīkuryāt / vyajyate
GK16msabdvvu:215: kiṃca lakṣaṇāyā gocaro lakṣyo na prayojanam /
GK16msabdvvu:220: / evaṃ hy abhidhāyā api phalaṃ śabdasya ca vācakasya saṃvid eva phalam / tac ca vinā
GK16msabdvvu:222: na ca vyāpārasya vyāpāra iti śabdasyaivāsau vācyaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:224: ca savyāpārasya phalasyeti tasyās tat kāryaṃ kāryaṃ ca phalam ucyate /
GK16msabdvvu:228: pramāṇasya yathā nīlaniṣṭhaiva prakaṭatā saṃvid vā phalam tadval lakṣaṇāyās tadviṣayaniṣṭham
GK16msabdvvu:231: siddham etal lakṣaṇāyā atirikto vyāpāraḥ samāśraṇīyaḥ //
GK16msabdvvu:232: nirūḍhā kācanānyā tu kāryā sā kācid anyathā /
GK16msabdvvu:233: anulomapratikūlādiśabdeṣu kācana sā vācyam arthaṃ parihṛtya lakṣya evārthe vācakavan
GK16msabdvvu:234: nirūḍhā / aparā tu mukhyārthabādhanimittaprayojaneṣu satsu kartavyā /
GK16msabdvvu:237: ityādāv andhādiśabdeṣu anupapadyamānatvād vācyam atyantatiraskṛtam iti vicchāyatvasya
GK16msabdvvu:239: sa puruṣaḥ sa ca jīvati satkṛtaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:245: tathā kokilādau dvika ityādikā anyathā na prayojyāḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:247: ihānantyād vyabhicārāc ca vākyasya vākyārtha iva viśeṣarūpe padārthe padasya saṅketaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:248: kartuṃ na pāryate iti sāmānya eva saṅketaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:250: abhihitānāṃ satām anvaya iti padārthānāṃ vaiśiṣṭyam /
GK16msabdvvu:253: atra pakṣe pūrvam abhidhā tato 'nvayabādhe lakṣaṇā /
GK16msabdvvu:255: devadatta gām ānayetyady uttamavṛddhavākyaśravaṇān madhyamavṛddhau viśiṣṭaṃ vyāpāraṃ
GK16msabdvvu:256: karotīti dṛṣṭvā vyutpādyamāno nirvibhāge 'rthe nirvibhāgaṃ vākyaṃ vācakaṃ jānāti /
GK16msabdvvu:257: tato yajñadatta gām ānayetyādivākyāntaraprayoge sati anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ niyatasya
GK16msabdvvu:258: niyatārtham avasyatīti sāmānyāvacchādite viśiṣṭa eva padārthe padānāṃ saṅketa ity
GK16msabdvvu:259: anvitānām eva satām abhidhānam iti viśiṣṭānāṃ padārthatā /
GK16msabdvvu:264: padāpekṣayābhihitānvayaḥ vākyāpekṣayā tv anvitābhidhānam iti dvayapakṣe dvayam /
GK16msabdvvu:269: padeṣu varṇavad vākyeṣu hi padānām anarthakatvam
GK16msabdvvu:271: kaśābhidhānāt turagasya yathā preṣito 'ham anena dhāvana
GK16msabdvvu:272: iti pratibhodeti tadvat pratibhāvaśād viśiṣtavākyāt pratipattir iti saiva vākyārthaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:275: yaś ca sambandho lakṣaṇāyā nimittaṃ taṃ pañcavidham āhuḥ / yathoktaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:277: vaiparītyāt kriyāyogāl lakṣaṇā pañcadhā matā // iti /
GK16msabdvvu:281: sādṛśyād yathā siṃho māṇavaka iti / yathā vā --
GK16msabdvvu:282: varṣe samasta evaikaḥ ślāghyaḥ ko 'py eṣa vāsaraḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:283: dinair mahattayānveyo yo na pūrvair na cāparaiḥ //
GK16msabdvvu:284: atra prakaraṇavaśād mahāpuruṣaḥ kaścil lakṣyate yasya kule pūrve bhāvino vā puruṣā
GK16msabdvvu:290: / atra hi chatrisāhacaryād achatrā apy evaṃ vyapadiśyante /
GK16msabdvvu:294: pṛthur asi guṇaiḥ kīrtyā rāmo nalo bharato bhavān
GK16msabdvvu:295: mahati samara śatrughnas tvaṃ tathā janakaḥ sthiteḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:297: katham asi na māṃdhātā deva trilokavijayy api //
GK16msabdvvu:301: yathā saṃketena mukhyārthabādhāditritayena ca sahāyenābhidhāyako lakṣakaś ca yathā
GK16msabdvvu:302: vā pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekasahagato vivakṣāyā anumāpakaḥ tathā pratibhānair malyavidagdhaparicayaprakaraṇādijñānasāpekṣo
GK16msabdvvu:303: vācako lakṣyakaś ca vyaṅgyam arthaṃ dhvaniśabdo vyanakti /
GK16msabdvvu:311: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaḥ paloehi /
GK16msabdvvu:312: mā pahia rattiandhaa sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16msabdvvu:314: mā pathika rātryandha śayyāyām āvayor nimaṅkṣyasi // ]
GK16msabdvvu:316: lakṣaṇāmūlaṃ yathā -- niśvāsāndha ivādarśa ity udāhṛtam /
GK16msabdvvu:321: kvāste duryodhano 'sau kathayata na ruṣā draṣṭum abhyāgatau svaḥ //
GK16msabdvvu:322: atraite varākā dāsabhāvaṃ gatāḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti asmadekaśaraṇāḥ paribhaviṣyanti ityādi
GK16msabdvvu:323: dyūtakāle bhavadbhiś cintitam āsīn nāsmakaṃ vismṛtam /
GK16msabdvvu:325: na kiṃ nirvyūḍhā ityādikaṃ tam artham abhivyajya sarvair eva kartā dyūtachalānām ityādibhir
GK16msabdvvu:332: atra dattasaṃketaḥ puruṣo vānīralatāgṛhaṃ praviṣṭa iti vyaṅgyam artham avagamayya
GK16msabdvvu:334: na caivam abhidhāyā lakṣaṇāyā vā kaścid avasara iti
GK16msabdvvu:337: iti vyaṅgyābhimato 'pi tātparyāt katham na vācyaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:338: / iha sarvāṇy eva kārakāṇi kārakatvāt savyāpārāṇīti sādhyāyamānāny ato bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe
GK16msabdvvu:339: “bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata” ity adagdhadahananyāyena yāvad avahitaṃ tāvad vidhīyate
GK16msabdvvu:342: / evaṃ hi pūrvo dhāvatīty aparārthe 'pi tātparyaṃ syāt /
GK16msabdvvu:348: evaṃ ca vācyatve kā vārttā vācyaviparītātmano vyaṅgyasya / na tu
GK16msabdvvu:355: evaṃbhūtāyāṃ pramāṇair apratipannāyāṃ hi sāmagryām upapattim
GK16msabdvvu:356: anapekṣyāpi samudayamānā pratītiḥ kena nihnotuṃ śakyata iti /
GK16msabdvvu:358: dhvananam / etac cānyatra vistareṇa vicāritam iti saṃkṣepeṇehoktam iti śivam //
